#include <iostream>
using namespace std;
unsigned long reverse(unsigned long sum);
 
 
main()
{
unsigned long sum;
int n,num[110],counter;
cin>>n;
int t=0;
while(t<n)
{
cin>>num[t++];
}
t=0;
while(t<n)
{
sum=num[t];
counter=0;
while(1)
{
unsigned long temp=reverse(sum);
if(temp==0)
break;
counter++;
sum=sum+reverse(sum);
}
cout<<counter<<" "<<sum<<endl;
t++;
}
}
 
unsigned long reverse(unsigned long sum)
{
unsigned long r=0,s=sum;
while(sum>0)
{
r=(r*10)+(sum%10);
sum=sum/10;
}
if(r==s)
return 0;
else
return r;
}
